DrugName: Beta blockers (e.g. metoprolol) for post-cardiac arrest and coronary artery disease management
ACE inhibitors (e.g. enalapril) or ARBs (e.g. losartan) for hypertension and diabetes control
Thiazide diuretics (e.g. hydrochlorothiazide) or calcium channel blockers (e.g. verapamil) for hypertension management
Glucagon-like peptide-1 receptor agonists (e.g. exenatide) or sulfonylureas (e.g. glimepiride) for diabetes control
Antiplatelet agents (e.g. clopidogrel) for post-cardiac arrest and coronary artery disease management
